docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Nov. 17 -- The, Uruguayan Government and the Secretariat General of the PanAmerican Conference do not share the pessimism which has arisen in some Latin-American capitals as a result of President Roosevelt's banning of discussion of...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Nov. 17 -- The, Uruguayan Government and the Secretariat General of the PanAmerican Conference do not share the pessimism which has arisen in some Latin-American capitals as a result of President Roosevelt's banning of discussion of tariffs and currency stabilization.
docs.abstract: U S views clear to Uruguay; statement by E Buero

docs.snippet: A plea to the public for early mailing in the coming Christmas season was made yesterday by the Postoffice Department. Coupled with this request was an announcement of the latest mailing dates for delivery in foreign countries before Christmas.

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Nov. 15. -- The Seventh Pan-American Conference, which will open here on Dec. 3, will receive European recognition for the first time. This will give it an international importance that may lift the Pan American Union out of its hitherto...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Nov. 15. -- The Seventh Pan-American Conference, which will open here on Dec. 3, will receive European recognition for the first time. This will give it an international importance that may lift the Pan American Union out of its hitherto purely regional character.

headline.main: League Would Cooperate With Pan American Union; Request to Work With Conference Is Seen As Forerunner of Intercourse That Would Strengthen Both Bodies.
